p: All adverse events will be documented during the intervention. If any adverse event occurs, it will be immediately reported and the participant will be received the corresponding treatment. We will analyze the causality to determine the severity and the relationship between the adverse events. Serious adverse events determined to be drug-induced will be reported to the ethical committee timely and discuss whether we should discontinue or modify the criteria. The trial will be allowed the unblinding after obtaining the consent of the main investigator.
